name: Fallen London: The Web of the Motherlings
storyline: Relics of a mysterious Fourth City Cult have disappeared, sparking a desperate scramble to reclaim them. A scarred Khaganian competes with a one-eyed, spidery Seamstress. Choose your alliances carefully, and be ready for a confrontation in the Forgotten Quarter.
summary: The Web of the Motherlings is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. The Web of the Motherlings was originally published as an Exceptional Story and is the first entry in the Season of Ruins.
